name: OpsGenie
description: Integrate with OpsGenie to list, create, acknowledge and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Alerts
tools.description: List alerts from OpsGenie. Optionally filter by query, status, or priority.

tools.name: Create Alert
tools.description: Create a new alert in OpsGenie. Provide a message and optional priority, tags, and description.

tools.name: Acknowledge Alert
tools.description: Acknowledge an OpsGenie alert. Accepts the alert by ID or alias.

tools.name: Close Alert
tools.description: Close an OpsGenie alert. Accepts the alert by ID or alias.

tools.name: List Schedules
tools.description: List on-call schedules from OpsGenie. Returns schedule names, timezones, and teams.
